cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: net-snmp bug fix and enhancement update

full_product_name.product_name: net-snmp-1:5.8-12.el8_1.1 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux AppStream (v. 8)
net-snmp-1:5.8-12.el8_1.1 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux BaseOS (v. 8)

notes.note: net-snmp: double free in usm_free_usmStateReference function in snmplib/snmpusm.c via an SNMPv3 GetBulk request

reference.description: bz#1851145: CVE-2019-20892 net-snmp: double free in usm_free_usmStateReference function in snmplib/snmpusm.c via an SNMPv3 GetBulk request

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note: An update for net-snmp is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.

The net-snmp packages provide various libraries and tools for the Simple
Network Management Protocol (SNMP), including an SNMP library, an
extensible agent, tools for requesting or setting information from SNMP
agents, tools for generating and handling SNMP traps, a version of the
netstat command which uses SNMP, and a Tk/Perl Management Information Base
(MIB) browser.
Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):
* net-snmpd double free or corruption error (BZ#1802055)
